DataElement.preferredName: Forced Vital Capacity Measurement Percentage Predicted Normal Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood._The maximum volume of air that can be exhaled after forced maximum inhalation._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard._A lab value of the percentage of predicted normal

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Forced Vital Capacity Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood._The maximum volume of air that can be exhaled after forced maximum inhalation._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Forced Vital Capacity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood.:The maximum volume of air that can be exhaled after forced maximum inhalation.

Concepts.definition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood.
The maximum volume of air that can be exhaled after forced maximum inhalation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A lab value of the percentage of predicted normal

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An extrapolation of given data into the future.:Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.:A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:Value; a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: An extrapolation of given data into the future.
Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.
A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
Value; a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
